issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.flashscore.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.flashscore.com%2F) ### Comment > The main flashscore.com website opens OK but when you click on a match, which opens up a pop up window with more details of the match, it appears to open OK then goes all white. ### Screenshots

comment.body:
> Hi. Cannot reproduce. What causes an issue - one of enabled filters?

Hi, sorry for the late reply but I didn't know there was a reply. But thanks to your question, I have figured out that it was the Adguard French filter that is causing this issue. Disabling just that filter and the bug doesn't occur anymore.
Thanks

comment.body:
HI Jelli
 
Please find bellow.  I did a reset of adguard to defaults which has removed the ad’s.
 
I have done this twice . ads are not showing at this time
 
Thank you
 

 
From: jellizaveta ***@***.***> 
Sent: Friday, March 24, 2023 1:48 AM
To: AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters ***@***.***>
Cc: wrh01 ***@***.***>; Mention ***@***.***>
Subject: Re: [AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters] www.9news.com.au (Issue #146203)
 
@wrh01 <https://github.com/wrh01>  Ads are blocked correctly on my end. Could you please check if AdGuard is detected on this page: https://adguard.com/en/test.html
—
